item.title: Emojis are sweeping the world by storm üå©
item.description:
On July 17, in honor of World Emoji Day, App Annie wanted to learn more about the world’s love for emojis. They teamed up with Leanplum to publish a report called “Winning App ‚ù§ (& üí∏ ) With Emojis” which explores mobile marketing trends. The report highlights some interesting findings, including the fact that the word “emoji” is now officially in the Oxford Dictionary. Additionally: The use of emojis grew significantly in 2016, increasing by 163%, and the range of emojis used by marketers also expanded by 10%...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emojis-are-sweeping-the-world-by-storm/
